content:
# I have successfully crafted 3 copper cables, bringing my total to 4 copper cables in inventory. My current inventory now reflects:
# - 2 transport belts
# - 2 stone bricks
# - 8 stones
# - 5 copper ore
# - 1 copper plate (remaining after crafting)
# - 4 copper cables
# - 1 iron gear wheel

# Now, I need to craft the electronic circuits. Each electronic circuit requires:
# - 3 copper cables
# - 1 iron plate

# I currently have 4 copper cables, which is sufficient to craft 1 electronic circuit. However, I still need to smelt some iron ore to obtain iron plates.

# Let's gather some iron ore to smelt into iron plates. I will move to the nearest iron ore resource location.

move_to(nearest(Resource.IronOre))  # Move towards the nearest iron ore resource location to gather iron.
